articles.title: Why regulating Big Tech is often pointless - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The ministry of corporate affairs (MCA) released a draft of the Digital Competition Bill to identify anti-competitive practices of tech companies last month
articles.content: Mumbai: There are moves afoot to regulate Big Tech in India along the lines of what the EU is doing, and the most recent developments in the US where Apple was sued for abusing its dominant position.… [+4199 chars]
